name: dbox-jobsub_server
author: Dennis D. Box, dbox@fnal.gov
summary: install and configure a jobsub server in a hurry
source: built with selected files from old GCOS puppetrepo-jobsub and a tutorial at https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-create-a-puppet-module-to-automate-wordpress-installation-on-ubuntu-14-04
description: Install and configure a jobsub server in a Hurry. Configuration is variables in manifest/vars.pp
